###
### Generated by free_reroll.py
### No cost to reroll gear enchants

SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/GameData/Economy/Economy_MoonOrbs.Economy_MoonOrbs,ReRollCostCap,Value,0,,(BaseValueConstant=1,BaseValueScale=0)

SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/GameData/Economy/Economy_MoonOrbs.Economy_MoonOrbs,BaseCost,Value,0,,(BaseValueConstant=1,BaseValueScale=0)


@title No Reload Notification
@version 1.0.0
@author Apocalyptech
@contact https://apocalyptech.com/contact.php
@categories qol, ui

@license Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
@license-url https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

###
### Removes the onscreen prompt to reload, when near the end of a mag.
###
### Generated by gen_no_reload_notification.py
###

SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/GameplayGlobals.GameplayGlobals,AmmoLowPercent,0,,0


@title Red Chest Timer Reset
@version 1.0.0
@author Apocalyptech
@contact https://apocalyptech.com/contact.php
@categories chests

@license Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
@license-url https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

###
### Prevents the game's red chests from remembering their opened state when
### quitting and restarting the game.  They will still have their usual timers
### while staying within the same game session, but a trip to the main menu
### will now let them be re-opened right away.
###
### Generated by gen_red_chest_timer_reset.py
###

###
### Mount Craw
###

SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,Goblin_P),/Game/Maps/Zone_1/Goblin/Goblin_Combat.Goblin_Combat:PersistentLevel.BPIO_Lootable_Daffodil_RedChest__0,PersistenceData.bStoreInSaveGame,0,,False
SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,Goblin_P),/Game/Maps/Zone_1/Goblin/Goblin_Combat.Goblin_Combat:PersistentLevel.BPIO_Lootable_Daffodil_RedChest__1,PersistenceData.bStoreInSaveGame,0,,False
SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,Goblin_P),/Game/Maps/Zone_1/Goblin/Goblin_Combat.Goblin_Combat:PersistentLevel.BPIO_Lootable_Daffodil_RedChest__2,PersistenceData.bStoreInSaveGame,0,,False

@title Skeleton Chest: Money Cost
@version 1.0.0
@author DexManly
@contact-discord dex_manly#5571
@categories chests, cheat, economy

@license Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
@license-url https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

###
### This mod changes the skeleton chest to use money instead of skeleton keys. Obviously pretty cheaty. This mod sets it to 2 million
### dollars. This will not scale and you may want to adjust BaseValueConstant to be whatever you need it to be.
###

SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,MatchAll),/Game/UI/InteractionPrompt/UIData_GoldenKey.UIData_GoldenKey,ActionText,0,,Use Money ([cashicon]%i)
SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,MatchAll),/Game/UI/InteractionPrompt/UIData_GoldenKey.UIData_GoldenKey,CurrencyType,0,,/Game/Gear/_Shared/_Design/InventoryCategories/InventoryCategory_Money
SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,MatchAll),/Game/UI/InteractionPrompt/UIData_GoldenKey.UIData_GoldenKey,Cost.BaseValueConstant,0,,2000000.0
